allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add debug logging for SingleSelect icon logic investigation

Added console logging to track whether SingleSelect icon-setting logic
is executing and finding selected items during initial load.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix SingleSelect icon display by unifying with MultiSelect logic

Changed SingleSelect to use the same direct DOM manipulation approach
as MultiSelect (_applySelectionOnly method). Now both modes:
- Set ancestors with "expanded" class (shows collapse/minus icon)
- Set children with "collapsed" class (shows expand/plus icon)
- Use direct classList manipulation instead of helper functions

This ensures consistent icon behavior between selection modes.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add CSS for expanded/collapsed icon display

Added missing CSS rules for .expanded and .collapsed classes:
- .expanded:before shows collapse icon (\e1ed - minus/down arrow)
- .collapsed:before shows expand icon (\e1ef - plus/right arrow)

This fixes the issue where icons weren''t appearing on tree nodes.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update CSS selectors for expanded/collapsed icons to target labels

Made CSS selectors more specific (label.expanded and label.collapsed)
to properly target the tree expander label elements.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Use correct icon codes from data_sap_icon variables

Updated CSS to use the exact icon unicode values from the existing
data_sap_icon_close and data_sap_icon_open variables:
- \e1f7 for expanded (minus icon)
- \e1f6 for collapsed (plus icon)

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Skip DefaultLevel logic for SingleSelect to prevent icon override

Modified DefaultLevel section to skip visibility and icon setting
for SingleSelect modes. This prevents the DefaultLevel logic from
overwriting the SingleSelect-specific icon states that are set in
the later SingleSelect section.

SingleSelect now fully controls its own icon display logic.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add debug logging to track ancestor icon setting

Added console logs to verify that expanded class is being applied
to ancestor nodes in SingleSelect mode.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Make CSS selectors more specific with full class chain

Updated CSS to use label.sapMTreeItemBaseExpander.expanded/collapsed
for more specificity and added display:inline-block to ensure icons render.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add delayed class check to debug if expanded class is being removed

Added setTimeout to verify if the expanded class persists after being set,
or if something else is removing it afterwards.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Use delayed execution to run SingleSelect icon logic after other code

Wrapped SingleSelect icon setting in double requestAnimationFrame + setTimeout
to ensure it runs after whatever is removing the expanded class from ancestors.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix DefaultLevel visibility for SingleSelect while preserving icon control

Changed DefaultLevel to always set node visibility (displayed/disabled)
for all modes including SingleSelect, but skip icon state setting for
SingleSelect (which handles its own icons in the delayed section).

This fixes the issue where SingleSelect wasn''t expanding to defaultLevel.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Set icons for all displayed nodes in SingleSelect with delayed execution

Modified SingleSelect to:
1. Use longer setTimeout delay (200ms) to run after other code
2. Set ALL displayed nodes to collapsed by default
3. Then override ancestors to expanded

This ensures all visible nodes have icons, not just ancestors.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
DEBUG: Set all SingleSelect nodes to expanded to test CSS

Simplified logic to set ALL displayed nodes to expanded class
to verify if CSS is working and if classes persist.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Restore proper SingleSelect icon logic with debug counters

Set all displayed nodes to collapsed (plus), then override ancestors
to expanded (minus). Added debug counters to verify final state.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add visibility logic to show selected node and siblings in SingleSelect

Restored code to show:
- Ancestors (with expanded/minus icon)
- Children of ancestors/siblings (with collapsed/plus icon)  
- Selected node itself (with collapsed/plus icon)

This matches the MultiSelect _applySelectionOnly behavior.

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
